answers.answer: Hi there!Masturbation is pretty normal and this should not be anything to feel guilty about. Premature ejaculation could develop in young adults due to a variety of causes. Psychological stress, performance anxiety, depression, neurogenic disorders peyronie's disease, body image issues, medications, alcohol, smoking, drugs/medications, hormonal imbalance, radiation therapy, kidney failure, metabolic disorders, multiple sclerosis, hypertension, diabetes, prostatitis, urethritis etc. just to name a few. Anxiety and stress play an important role in the development of erectile dysfunction; and is the most common possible cause. You could try being relaxed and working on the psychological factors. It might also be beneficial to get rid of factors like smoking/ alcohol/ drugs, if involved. In case this doesn’t work; I would suggest seeing your primary care physician for an evaluation of the above mentioned causes and appropriate specific treatment.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: I have done many bad things in my life and I did masturbation as well. I wasted my youth by trying some nonsense things. What should I do. I have done engagement and very soon I will be married soon. I am very worried and depressed.Please help. I am waiting for your respected opinions.
title: Semen flows and premature ejaculation?
